description: Spice up some lamb chops with Moroccan-inspired seasoning, serve with mashed chickpeas and chopped tomatoes tossed with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and you've got a tasty feast on the table in less than half an hour.
name: Harissa-spiced Lamb Chops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat and mash roughly with a potato masher; it should not be smooth. Stir in the coriander and season generously. Serve the chops with the chickpea mash and a dressed tomato salad.
